## SerializablePipelineOptions interface

Represents serializable options for a pipeline. It extends `PipelineOptions` with an array of `SerializablePipeOptions` to represent individual pipe configurations.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface SerializablePipelineOptions extends PipelineOptions 
```
**Extends:** [PipelineOptions](./pipeline.pipelineoptions.md)
